Sentencas: The time changes of the white line and pre-edge intensities of Co and Fe K-edge in (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Co0.8Fe0.2) O3-delta (BSCF) were observed to estimate the oxide ion diffusion related to Co and Fe ions by using in -situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS) during oxidation.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy

Sentencas: The 20 mu m self-standing BSCF film was prepared for in -situ XAS measurements.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy

Sentencas: The time changes of absorption were fitted to the exponential decay function with two terms.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy

Sentencas: The longer relaxation time (iota), related to the oxide ion diffusion during the oxidation of BSCF, is dependent on temperature.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy

Sentencas: The oxide ion diffusion coefficients (D) were calculated from the iota s estimated by in - situ XAS.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy

Sentencas: The values of the activation energy (E-a) for D related to Co K-edge white line, Co pre-edge, and Fe pre-edge were 1.8-2.0 eV. The value of E-a for D related to Fe K-edge white line, however, was higher than other absorption values at approximately 2.3 eV. We discussed the oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in BSCF using in - situ XAS.
Titulo: Oxide ion diffusion mechanism related to Co and Fe ions in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) (Co0.8Fe0.2)O3-δ using in-situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy
